tool_description: Fast and Reliable Perspectives Web Searches on Google in Real-Time - Videos, News, Social - Reddit, Stack Overflow, and Other Community-First Sites.
name: Real-Time Perspectives Search
title: Real-Time Perspectives Search

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for Google's Perspectives on the web - Videos, News, Reddit, Stack Overflow, and other community-first sites.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the search (Google's *hl* parameter).

**Allowed values:** 2-letter country code, see [ISO 639-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default:** `en`.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description:
Number of results to skip (for pagination).

**Allowed values:** positive integers.
**Default:** `0`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
The country / region from for which to make the query.

**Allowed values:** 2-letter country code, see [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
**Default:** `us`.

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description:
Find perspectives published in a specific time range.

**Allowed values:** `hour, day, week, month, year`
